thread.title: Mr Smith

author: Mr Smith
title: Mr Smith
text: Dave came to put two tyres on my mothers car. Unfortunately, she suffers from dementia. Dave was brilliant - understanding my mothers situation, keeping in touch with me (I live 100miles away) and doing a great job in spite of my mother not being able to find the car keys or lock nuts!! First class service - will definitely use again! ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š
